Introducing our new mobile banking experience. Get instant access to your banking information from the brand new screens.

SC Mobile 2.0 introduces SC Mobile Key, a brand new authentication method for improved security, and a fresh look that enhances your experience.

SC Mobile 2.0 introduces SC Mobile Key, a brand new authentication method for improved security, and a fresh look that enhances your experience.

Returning with a new look, SC Mobile 2.0 brings you a seamless mobile banking experience. Introducing:
-Credit Card Block & Replacement function under Help & Services
-SC Mobile Key – advanced authentication method for improved security
-Bug fixes and performance improvement (credit card statement download, biometric login, etc.)
Thank you for Banking with Us, if you need any support, please send us an email at Contact.SCB@sc.com

Returning with a new look, SC Mobile 2.0 brings you a seamless mobile banking experience. Introducing:
-Credit Card Block & Replacement function under Help & Services
-SC Mobile Key – advanced authentication method for improved security
-Bug fixes and performance improvement (credit card statement download, biometric login, etc.)
Thank you for Banking with Us, if you need any support, please send us an email at Contact.SCB@sc.com

The SC Mobile has been updated with your seamless banking experience at core. With this update, you will be able to enjoy these new features:

- Receive instant notifications from SC Mobile app for an all-in-one experience with Inbox Notifications. You will be able to receive communication regarding your current accounts, as well as credit cards and latest promotional offers.
- Learn more about and apply for our wide range of products directly from the welcome screen.
- Self servicing features: card activation and pin change; card block & replacement; real time profile update

Thank you for Banking with Us, if you need any support, please send us an email at Contact.SCB@sc.com or call us at (84 24) 3696 0000 / (84 28) 3911 0000

We are excited to introduce the latest updated SC Mobile App, which offers our valued clients with various new features:

- Instant Transfer 24/7 offers you the best experience in local payment. Beneficiary will receive the payment instantly irrespective of weekend or public holiday.

- Receive instant notifications from SC Mobile app for an all-in-one experience with Inbox Notifications. You will be able to receive communication regarding your current accounts, as well as credit cards and latest promotional offers.
- Self-service features: all necessary services regarding current accounts, loans, credit cards and profile update have been in one place.

Thank you for Banking with Us, if you need any support, please send us an email at Contact.SCB@sc.com or call us at (84 24) 3696 0000 / (84 28) 3911 0000
